title: BPdiet
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014033217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dietbanner_4273.gif)

[backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014033217/http:/www.backpacker.gr/) presents BPdiet. An extremely "fat" typeface suitable for titles and (very) small texts. Feel free to play around with its spacing and kerning for better results. One regular and one italics variation, both available in OTF format.
author: gtrianta
